entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia late in the evening and overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 15 February 2023
